title: [Otherworldly Wealth, Lobby]
description: A pair of skeletons, bedecked in faded smoking jackets and cravats, sit on elevated platforms before several rows of benches, the duo elbowing one another as they chuckle to themselves.  Gilt-framed paintings of towns and villages cover the scratched stone walls, the images appearing to move from picture to picture as they navigate the vertebral-carved edges.  A thick glass-paned tank is filled in the skeletal forms of several fish, bumping into one another as they swim about the greenish water.
